subtitle.default: Used {{ number_of_uses_to_date }} times (see individual codes for more info)

undo_message.default: Looks like you didn't save your changes! What would you like to do with them?

success.default: All done! We've imported your codes into the system.

helper_text.default: Paste multiple space-separated codes in the field above to add all of them at once. Importing duplicate codes clears their usage stats.

v8n_required.default: Please add at least one code

undo_message.default: Looks like you didn't save your changes! What would you like to do with them?

invalid_form.default: These parameters won't generate any codes. Please make sure that the length of the code is greater than the length of the prefix, does not exceed 50 characters in total and that the code itself does not contain spaces.

helper_text.default: The length value is inclusive of this prefix.
This is what the generated codes will look like.
Coupon name is visible to the customers.

v8n_required.default: Please enter a name for this coupon.

v8n_too_long.default: Please shorten the name to 50 characters or less.

helper_text.default: Add rules to define how this coupon will affect order total. You can get started by selecting one of the examples from the dropdown on top right.

v8n_required.default: Please add at least one discount rule in this section.

v8n_too_long.default: Unfortunately we are unable to store that many discount rules at the moment. Please reduce the number of rules in this section until this message disappears.

undo_message.default: Looks like you didn't save your changes! What would you like to do with them?

helper_text.default: The string value of this coupon code which your customer will add to their cart to use this coupon.

v8n_too_long.default: Coupon code must be 50 characters or less

v8n_has_spaces.default: Please remove spaces from the coupon code

helper_text.default: For informational purposes, this shows you how many times this coupon code has already been used.

source_MIT.default: This transaction was initiated by the merchant

source_CIT.default: This transaction was initiated by the customer

delete_prompt.default: Are you sure you'd like to remove this coupon code? You won't be able to bring it back.

line_2.default: Added on {{ date_created, date }} at {{ date_created, time }}

delete_message.default: Please confirm that you'd like to remove this attribute from the item.

undo_message.default: Looks like you didn't save your changes! What would you like to do with them?

helper_text.default: Name of this attribute. It does not have to be unique.

v8n_too_long.default: Please choose a name that is 500 characters long or less.

helper_text.default: Value of this attribute. Attribute values are automatically HTML-escaped.

v8n_required.default: Please provide a value for this attribute.

v8n_too_long.default: Unfortunately we can't store values that are more than 1000 characters long.

helper_text.default: Controls who can see this attribute. Public attributes can be shown to anyone, including customers. Private attributes are more suitable for configuration or technical details which are irrelevant to the public. Restricted attributes can only be viewed with the OAuth client that created them.

delete_prompt.default: Are you sure you'd like to remove this attribute? You won't be able to bring it back.

helper_text.default: The maximum number of times this coupon can be used. Leave blank for unlimited uses.

v8n_too_small.default: Please enter a value greater or equal to 0.

helper_text.default: The maximum number of times a single customer can use this coupon. Leave blank for unlimited uses.

v8n_too_small.default: Please enter a value greater or equal to 0.

helper_text.default: The maximum number of times a single code can be used. Leave blank for unlimited uses.

v8n_too_small.default: Please enter a value greater or equal to 0.

placeholder.default: Enter a product code and hit Enter

helper_text.default: We'll apply this coupon only if one of the rules in the list matches the product code. Wildcards are allowed.

v8n_too_long.default: Unfortunately we are unable to store that many product code restrictions at the moment. Please reduce the number of rules in this section until this message disappears.

option_multiple_codes_allowed.default: Allow multiple codes on the same order

option_exclude_category_discounts.default: Don't apply category discounts with this coupon

option_exclude_line_item_discounts.default: Don't apply line item discounts with this coupon

helper_text.default: The date and time when this coupon will become active. Leave blank to activate immediately.
The date and time when this coupon will expire. Leave blank for no expiration.

placeholder.default: Enter a product code and hit Enter

helper_text.default: This coupon will be automatically applied when a subscription includes a product with one of the codes in the list. Wildcards are allowed just like in product code restrictions.

v8n_too_long.default: Unfortunately we are unable to store that many subscription restrictions at the moment. Please reduce the number of rules in this section until this message disappears.

helper_text.default: This coupon will be automatically applied when a customer record matches this query.

v8n_too_long.default: Unfortunately we are unable to store that many customer restrictions at the moment. Please reduce the number of rules in this section until this message disappears.

helper_text.default: This restricts the usage of a coupon code based on an item option's name and value. When defined, the coupon will only apply to items with the specified option name and value. Wildcards are allowed.

v8n_too_long.default: Unfortunately we are unable to store that many item option restrictions at the moment. Please reduce the number of rules in this section until this message disappears.

helper_text.default: Limit which categories this coupon applies to. All changes are saved automatically.
The tax rate to apply to the coupon in tax-inclusive mode. This is a decimal value from 0 to 1.

v8n_too_small.default: Please enter a value greater or equal to 0.

v8n_too_big.default: Please enter a value less than or equal to 1.

delete_prompt.default: This action is irreversible. Are you sure you want to delete this coupon?
